metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4077 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient data validation in Extensions in Google Chrome prior to115.0.5790.170 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to inject scripts or HTML into a privileged page via acrafted Chrome Extension. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
